headline.main: NAZI GUNS SHELL KRONSTADT BASE; Soviet Cruiser Reported Hit -- Germans Also Say That a Battleship Was Bombed LADOGA VICTORY CLAIMED Russian Landing in Attempt to Relieve Leningrad Soldiers Is Termed a Failure

lead_paragraph: BERLIN, Sept. 28 -- The mass of the German forces that were said to have trapped and defeated five Russian armies east of Kiev is now being manoeuvred into position for a new offensive in the Eastern Ukraine, it was reported here tonight.
abstract: USSR cruiser reptd hit, warship bombed
snippet: BERLIN, Sept. 28 -- The mass of the German forces that were said to have trapped and defeated five Russian armies east of Kiev is now being manoeuvred into position for a new offensive in the Eastern Ukraine, it was reported here tonight....

byline.original: By Telephone to THE NEW YORK TIMES
